Class Collider

  • java.lang.Object
    • physics.Collider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, NetObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Damagable, MapWall

    public abstract class Collider
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, NetObject
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isBlocking

        public boolean isBlocking
        Can other objects pass through the collider
        if on one of the colliders has isBlocking == false the colliders can pass through each other.
        onCollision will still be called

      • isStatic

        public boolean isStatic
        can the collider be moved TODO replace this with endless mass after implementing force into physics

      • Collider

        public Collider(Vector pos,
                Vector size,
                Vector velocity,
                int layer)
        Create the collider, and add it to physics
        Parameters:
        pos - the initial position of the Collider
        size - the initial size of the Collider
        velocity - the initial velocity of the Collider
        layer - the initial layer of the Collider
